resources.string: Error while fetching data. Please check network access.
Unexpected error occurred, Please retry or clear application data.

This application contains 4 implementation of Album gallery. 

There is two type of Album Gallery: 
 

Simple: All photo are shown on a single GridLayout


Sectioned: Photo are shown on a GridLayout with an Album header 
 

Each type is implementation using simple list data and using paged data.
Your Album is empty. Click on retry to synchronize with server again
